column4: when i plug something into my mic i can't hear myself through the speakers help
when i plug a microphone into my mic input i can't hear myself through the speakers help
I believe that is normal - ubuntu does not stream input to output by default, I was able to do it with a command line command
this is how I did it: http://askubuntu.com/questions/2719/how-do-i-output-my-audio-input
